short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Improve the ESPN NBA box score viewing experience

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension adds custom CSS to the ESPN NBA box score to improve the viewing experience.

NOTES
- When you land on the box score page you may need to refresh your browser. For best results open a new tab and hit: http://espn.com/nba/scoreboard.

ENHANCEMENTS
- Fits everything on one page. Team box scores appear side-by-side rather than stacked.

If you wish to remove ads you will need to use an ad blocker.

v 0.2.4   –––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––

- Added highlighting of on-court players to box score. This works based on the five players whose stats were most recently updated, so it usually takes a short while to kick in after a game starts or after a stoppage (time out, end of quarter). The most reliable stats to indicate who's on court are +/- and minutes because these increase even if a player doesn't add any stats but this does mean it can take a while to update if no one scores for a minute or two.
